title: Violante
description: My father’s condemnation and disgust at my preference for women over men could destroy my entire world, including our family. The lessons, the rehabilitation he's subjecting me to endure are slowly tearing the life from my soul. His cruellest act in pursuit of curing the filth he believes is inside of me is that every day I'm forced to watch as he tortures an innocent young woman. My father's aim is both to punish and to teach me how to adhere to his twisted rules… A parent's love is supposed to be unconditional, but what happens when that love turns to hatred? Trigger & Content Warning This story is NOT a normal FF Dark Romance.This story contains themes of extreme homophobia. There are scenes of graphic (MF) sexual violence and psychological reconditioning. If you are sensitive to any of these topics this story may not be suited to you. Not suitable for readers under the age of 18.
author: Ally Vance
